name: Dodgepong - My very first Game
description:
CONTROLS:

2 players on one keyboard!

Left Player: W and S for moving the paddle up and down 
Left Player: Space Bar to shoot the ball

Right Player: Up and Down arrow keys for moving the paddle up and down
Right Player: NUM0 to shoot the ball

RETURN button to restart after someone wins!

RULES:

Left player always starts with the ball.
Whoever gets hit loses a life and gets to shoot the ball next.
Once shot, dodge the ball as long as possible.
First player to lose 9 lives loses.

WARNING! THE GAME MIGHT BE SUPER LOUD SO PREPARE TO TURN THE GAME SOUND DOWN! sorry ^^'

Check out the DEVLOG for design thoughts and the development background story :)
(and why it's actually called "Kitty Dodgepong" cx)
